pages.text: Restricts which inventory slots a channel can access. Enter slot numbers using range notation like 0-8, 18, 27-35. Slot numbers go from 0 to 53.$(br2)Set it to whitelist (only use these slots) or blacklist (use all slots except these). Only affects item transfers, not fluids.

pages.title: On Export vs Import
pages.text: $(l)On an export channel:$() Controls which slots in the source container get read. Items in other slots are ignored, even if they match other filters.$(br2)$(l)On an import channel:$() Controls which slots in the destination container get written to. Items will only be placed into the allowed slots.$(br2)Both sides work independently. You can restrict the source to read from the top row and the destination to write to the bottom row.
